If Heroes from across times and
places gather here, does that mean
our crusader ancestors are here?$k$pIf so, I hope to have an audience
with them.

I promised that when the fighting
ended we would all join each other
in celebration, but...$k$pRegretfully, that promise can
no longer be kept.

There is not much one can achieve
on their own. It is wise to seek advice
from friends. Remember, I am here.

Deirdre... If our meeting was fated,
the tragedy that followed must, too,
have been an inevitability...$k$pEven so, I will never regret my love
for her.

Shannan and Oifey raised Seliph to
be a great man in my stead. I wish
I could express my full appreciation.

Here you are. For having been good
to $Nf.

Battle is not a simple matter of
strength. Without it, however, some
things cannot be protected...

Baldr grant me the strength to fight
once more...

It is too late for anger. I must take
one step at a time... I must keep
moving forward.

I thank you. I hope to repay this
kindness you've done me.

I am Sigurd of Chalphy. My father,
my dear friends, and all those under
me risked everything...$k$pNow, all I am left with are my regrets.

I fought for my beliefs, my ideals.
My blood hot, I took up the sword,
my honor and pride on the line.$k$pEven so, I asked myself, why must
we wage this war? For the light?
The light...$k$pBack then I could not see the evil
of which Claud of Edda spoke, the
rage in the shadows of the world.$k$pAlthough I do not regret my choices,
chasing after what was before me
distracted me from the true evil.$k$pMy fate may have been unavoidable.
But seeing you work revives that
drive to pursue my ideals once more.$k$pKeep the kindness, courage, and
strength in your heart burning...$k$pBy doing so, a world without war will
one day arrive, and a world of light
will be ours. In that I have every faith.

There is nothing to fear.
Withdraw your blade!
I will see it done.
On your guard!
And yet I fall...
Sigh...
I am Sigurd, of House Chalphy.
Oh? Have you something to ask me? I will listen.
I, a Legendary Hero? I find that difficult to credit.
My wife Deirdre commands remarkable magic. Together, we will lend you our strength.
I descend from the crusader Baldr. On the battlefield, I strive to stay worthy to his name.
Seliph has grown into a remarkable young man. He has exceeded my expectations.
I am honored to fight shoulder to shoulder with you.
Well, well.
Of course.
I shall strike!
